activities: Biogen Idec, Inc. will use and otherwise process European Employee PII in the United States for the following purposes: Workflow management, such as assigning, managing and administering projects; Compensation; Performance management; Succession planning; Benefits; Information technology support and database hosting services; Monitoring and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures; and Reporting for government statistics.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
